name: 1. What are the names of the countries with population greater than 8 million?
query: SELECT name FROM country WHERE population > 8000000;

name: 2. What are the names of the countries that have “land” in their names?
query: SELECT name FROM country WHERE name LIKE '%land%';

name: 3. What are the names of the cities with population in between 500,000 and 1 million?
query: SELECT name FROM city WHERE population BETWEEN 500000 AND 1000000;

name: 4. What are the names of all the countries on the continent "Europe"?
query: SELECT name FROM country WHERE Continent = 'Europe';

name: 5. List all the countries in the descending order based on their surface areas.
query: SELECT name FROM country ORDER BY SurfaceArea DESC;

name: 6. What are the names of all the cities in the Netherlands?
query: SELECT city.name AS CityName FROM city INNER JOIN country ON city.CountryCode = country.Code WHERE country.name = 'Netherlands';

name: 7. What is the population of Rotterdam?
query: SELECT population FROM city WHERE Name = 'Rotterdam';

name: 8. What is the top 10 countries based on surface area?
query: SELECT name FROM country ORDER BY SurfaceArea DESC LIMIT 10;

name: 9. What is the top 10 cities with the highest population?
query: SELECT Name FROM city ORDER BY Population DESC LIMIT 10;

name: 10. What is the population of the world?
query: SELECT SUM(population) AS populationOfWorld FROM country;
